title.narrative: Capacities for emergency preparedness strengthened in all countries

description.narrative: National action plans for health security (gap identification, costing, investment case and resource mapping); strengthening IHR core capacities (laboratories, capacity of national surveillance, incl. field epi training programmes, capacity for national emergency operation centres (EOC), risk communications, multisectoral cooperation, points of entry (PoEs)); minimum health systems for health security (minimum national workforce, infrastructure and WASH, infection prevention and control, clinical management); disaster risk reduction (safe hospitals, resilient communities).

participating-org.narrative: DG for International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO), European Commission
United Nations Central Emergency Response Fund (CERF)
United States Agency for International Development (USAID)

mailing-address.narrative: Cit? du Djou?, P.O.Box 06 Brazzaville, Republic of Congo

provider-org.narrative: United Nations Central Emergency Response Fund (CERF)
United States Agency for International Development (USAID)

title.narrative: Triple billion targets - tracking the work of WHO, countries, regions and partners to meet the Triple Billion targets and health-related Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
Country Cooperation Strategy Brief - Democratic Republic of the Congo (2018)
